select u.id, u.username, u.last_login_time, u.last_login_ip, u.enabled, t.thread_num, p.post_num from admin_user u left join (select u.id user_id, max(IFNULL(r.weight, 0)) weight from admin_user u left join admin_user__role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join admin_role r on r.id = ur.role_id group by u.id ) uw on uw.user_id = u.id left join (select user_id, count(*) thread_num from thread group by user_id) t on t.user_id = u.id left join (select user_id, count(*) post_num from post group by user_id) p on p.user_id = u.id where (uw.weight <= #{weight} or uw.weight is null )
and u.username like #{searchLike}
select max(r.weight) from admin_user u left join admin_user__role ur on ur.user_id = u.id left join admin_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.id = #{userId}
